lines: Komvwa Mwami ulaita, Tambula luse lwa Jesu;
Ciindi naci kombelezya, Bweza ciingano cakwe,
Utalangi zya munyika, Zyonse zila kumana
Komvwa ijwi lila kwiita, Zuba litana Bbila,
Kusalala kwakwe Jesu, Kusalazye nzila zyako,
Jesu nje nzila ya buumi Ð tola ciingano
Komvwa Mwami wa luyando, Waka fwila bantu bonse;
Kuti bonse bafutuke, Balanga kuli nguwe,
Ijwi lyakwe Mufutuli, Lila kuita kwakwe Ð
Komvwa Mwami ulaita, Uciita moyo wako,
Mazuba ako mu nyika, Tali manji bunene Ð
